participant_1.background:
I enjoy the flexibility of my work schedule so I can spend time with my family and dog.
I help people find the perfect outfit, then I head out with my dog Allie to paddle board.
i m a kindergarten teacher.
i am the middle child of 3 siblings.
i own an iphone.

participant_2.background:
I'm a 35 year old male police officer who collects interesting things I find on my couch.
my favorite books are the harry potter books.
I start my day early, walk my dog, and then work on my tasks until late at night, listening to music about animals.
I enjoy listening to music and thinking about my next move.
i studied early childhood education in college.

content.text: Hi!
Hello!
How is your day going?
My day is going well. How is yours?
It is going well. I am a kindergarten teacher and I love my job.
That is great to hear! I am a police officer and I enjoy my job as well.
What is your favorite part of your job?
I enjoy helping people and making a difference in my community.
That is a great answer. I enjoy helping my students learn and grow.
That sounds like a very rewarding job.
It is! I am glad to hear that you enjoy your job as well.
I am as well. What are your hobbies?
I enjoy paddle boarding and spending time with my family and dog.
Those sound like fun hobbies. I enjoy walking my dog and listening to music.
What kind of music do you enjoy listening to?
I enjoy listening to music about animals.
That is interesting. I have never heard of that before.
It is a genre of music that is composed of sounds that animals make.
That sounds like it would be relaxing to listen to.
It is! I find it to be very calming.
I am glad to hear that. I am always looking for new music to listen to.
I am happy to share some of my favorite animal music with you if you would like.
I would love that!
Great! I will send you some links later today.
Thank you! I look forward to hearing it.
You are welcome! I hope you enjoy it
